snippet: The husband of a Congressional candidate was charged with vandalism over the weekend after the son of the candidate's opponent accused him of tearing down rival campaign signs.    A citation was given to Stephen S. Brixey III, the husband of Loret...
lead_paragraph: The husband of a Congressional candidate was charged with vandalism over the weekend after the son of the candidate's opponent accused him of tearing down rival campaign signs. A citation was given to Stephen S. Brixey III, the husband of Loretta Sanchez, after the incident on Saturday. Mark Dornan, 37, the son of Representative Robert K. Dornan, reported Mr. Brixey to the police, Sgt. Chuck O'Connor of the Anaheim police said.
abstract: Stephen S Brixey 3d, whose wife, Loretta Sanchez, a Democrat, is seeking to unseat Repr Robert K Dornan of California, is charged with vandalism for allegedly tearing down Dornan's campaign signs (S)
